ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 191
ygData.msgSnippet: I know that Screaming Terror could now be used in a mezmerize/run away type of tactic, and if you pulled two MOBs you could mez one and try and kill the other
ygData.messageBody:
I know that Screaming Terror could now be used in a mezmerize/run away type
of tactic, and if you pulled two MOBs you could mez one and try and kill the
other as quickly as possible, but I was wondering if someone could give up
any additional uses for this spell now that it has changed?

Thanks in advance!
Aazen Sy'Vex
DE Necro of his 20th Season

In a message dated 12/2/99 2:59:58 AM Pacific Standard Time,
EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com writes:

<< >Screaming Terror (Necromancer) has changed. It is no longer a "Run Away"
>Fear spell - instead the targeted creature will cower in terror until it
>takes damage (similar to the Enchanter's Mesmerize spell). The Environment
>limit (Dungeons only) has been removed.
>
>This rocks!! >>
